Owlhawk:  This is the primitive version of the planet
Earth, we Maximals are from it's future, the Predicons
wish to change the past so their ancestors the
Decepticons won the Great Wars and they rule, while we
seek to preserve the past where our ancestors the
Autobots, aided by humans won the Great Wars.  Of
course you probably don't know anything about these
humans, or our ancestors.

--- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@...> wrote:
> Ragnar: I take it we are welcome...
> 
> Katya: Let us hope so.
> 
> They both follow, catching up soon enough with
> Owlhawk.
> 
> Ragnar: By the way, do you mind presenting yourself
> and telling us 
> about this place?
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...>
> wrote:
> > Owlhawk:  Talk to a technician.  If we did notice
> it I was 
> > clueless.....well we should get in the base.  Even
> for a transmetal 
> > it's a bad idea to spend to much time outside on
> this rock in robot 
> > mode.  The energon can fry you.  Follow me.  BEAST
> MODE!
> > 
> > He transformed.
> > 
> > Owlhawk:  By the way it's 'til' all are one'.
> > 
> > He took off and headed back to base, but opened a
> comlink.
> > 
> > Owlhawk:  Owlhawk to base.  I think these may be a
> newly discovered 
> > type of Transformers we have no knowledge of. 
> They claim not to 
> even 
> > know what Maximals and Predicons are, but get
> ready to blast them if 
> > they turn out to be hostile.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure"
> <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > Katya looks confusely at him.
> > > 
> > > Katya: I know of "Thus shall it stand until we
> all shall fall". It 
> > is 
> > > a ceremonial sentence. But I do not know about
> yours.
> > > 
> > > Ragnar: And we are no more familiar with
> predacon than we are with 
> > > Maximals. We are on this stravag world since the
> wave hit our ship 
> > > above Strana Mechty. If you did not notice the
> destroyed warship 
> > > falling down, then maybe you should check your
> sensors better.
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816"
> <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> > > > OOC: I know but Owlhawk doesn't.
> > > > 
> > > > BIC:  Owlhawk looked confused.
> > > > 
> > > > Owlhawk:  Look I don't know what the Pit you
> are, but I have no 
> > > > reason to think you're not Predicon spies. 
> When did your ship 
> > land? 
> > >  
> > > > It seems we would have noticed it?  Or did you
> come out of 
> stasis 
> > > > pods?
> > > > 
> > > > Then it occurs to Owlhawk these strange
> creatures don't seem to 
> > be 
> > > > Cybertronian, or even have any communication
> with them.  He may 
> > have 
> > > > found a new race of transformers.  He decides
> to test them.
> > > > 
> > > > Owlhawk:  FINISH THIS SENTENCE!  "TIL' ALL
> ARE...."
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure"
> <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > > OOC: there are only Ghost Bear and Wolf
> Clans insignia 
> visible. 
> > > > They 
> > > > > are in mech mode so he probably won't see
> them as human.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Ragnar: What is that thing? It spoke! Is he
> hostile you think?
> > > > > 
> > > > > Katya: Best to use words for now. It seems
> to be armed with 
> > alien 
> > > > > technologies... Even an Elemental warrior
> would not completely 
> > > fill 
> > > > > such a huge battle armor... (She raised her
> voice) Who or 
> > whatever 
> > > > you 
> > > > > are, we are not hostile to you. We demand
> safcon, the safe 
> > passage 
> > > > > through this area. I am Galaxy commander
> Katya Kerensky, 
> > > Loremaster 
> > > > of 
> > > > > the Wolf Clan, and I travel with Star
> Colonel Ragnar of the 
> > Ghost 
> > > > Bear 
> > > > > Clan.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Ragnar: There is more. We do not know what a
> Maximal is. We 
> may 
> > > not 
> > > > be 
> > > > > hostile, but in the event of your attack, we
> will make sure 
> you 
> > > > regret 
> > > > > ever pointing a weapon at us. So, shall this
> be a friendly 
> chat 
> > or 
> > > > a 
> > > > > trial of grievance?
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart
> <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> > > > > > OOC: These are the ones approaching the

> > > > > >

> but I doubt
> > > > > > from the pictures I've seen he could see
> the humans.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > --- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@h...>
> wrote:
> > > > > > > In the grassy plain, the two mech-humans
> slowly
> > > > > > > advance, Katya 
> > > > > > > deliberately slowing down so the heavier
> Ragnar
> > > > > > > could catch up with 
> > > > > > > her. She was willing to know more of

> > > > > > > had left the true 
> > > > > > > Wolves.
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > Katya: Tell me, Ragnar, how was it with

> > > > > > > what happened in

> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > Ragnar smiled: Well, it has been a job

> > > > > > > Jade Falcons back 
> > > > > > > as we could from the cordon. The Kell

> > > > > > > help a lot, and their 
> > > > > > > mech facilities helped us to rebuild a
> rather strong
> > > > > > > touman. Then, I 
> > > > > > > was captured by the Bears...
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > Katya: Ah yes! I remember Bjorn
> Jorgensson saying
> > > > > > > once you were a key 
> > > > > > > element for the Ghost Bears. What then?
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > Ragnar thought for a moment.
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > Ragnar: Bjorn is a man I can call my
> friend, a
> > > > > > > soldier I can call a 
> > > > > > > true warrior, and a politician of the
> kind of the
> > > > > > > Kerenskys! He 
> > > > > > > trusted me, pushed me back to the
> warrior's
